name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Stacy BRITTON, Petitioner

parties:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Stacy BRITTON, Petitioner

opinions.text:
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of October, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue as stated by Petitioner is:
Should out of state law enforcement officers acting within their own state but solely at the request of Pennsylvania law enforcement officers be considered agents of the Pennsylvania law enforcement and as such governed by the same statutory and constitutional standards as the Pennsylvania law enforcement officers?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Stacy BRITTON, Petitioner
No. 238 MAL 2018
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
October 2, 2018
ORDER
